availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, lawyer. Kentucky native. Married to Glorrine Harris. Father of Henry Harris, Eugenia Harris, Ellen Harris, Kate Harris, Sallie Harris, and Alfred Harris.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, Dristrict 2, p. stamped 217. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, 5th Ward, p. 221. Find A Grave, "Alfred Harris, Sr. (1816-1872)," Memorial #94812766, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=94812766&ref=acom (accessed [July, 6, 2017).
